website_summaries.verdict: A top-rated energy bar, featuring the right balance of chewiness with sweet, salty, and vanilla flavors.
pros: Peanuts provide a salty, chewy texture while the semisweet chocolate chips balance with a hint of bitter
Opens cleanly away from its foil-lined wrapper, a big bonus during a hot day on the trail
cons: Very high in sugar, a turn-off for those on stricter diets

customer_reviews.title: Inconsistent Quality; Do Not Buy on Amazon
customer_reviews.text: So annoyed by the inconsistent quality. Have been ordering the Peanut Butter Chocolate chip but this is the 3rd box out of 4 that has arrived with incredibly dry bars. They are rock hard and crumble when you attempt to bite them which is NOT how these bars typically are.
customer_reviews.author: Courtney L

customer_reviews.title: LARGE PIECES of PITS
customer_reviews.text: Please BOYCOTT until they change this. Consumer warning! I'm sorry, but I am never buying Larabar product again. Too many LARGE PIECES of PITS - and there is NO warning on the label that these might contain pits. I can't believe how many reviews I read today that go back 3 years with this complaint - so many people with broken teeth! It's really irresponsible, and shameful behavior.
customer_reviews.author: Sam V.

customer_reviews.title: Spider & web
customer_reviews.text: Opened one of these up last night only to find a spider web formed around the bar! Immediately threw it on the floor, as I assumed the spider must still be in there (dead or alive). Thankful I didn't take a bite out of this one. Pretty sure my view on Larabar has changed unfortunately.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer Paige

customer_reviews.title: Poor wuality compared to in store purchase
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these from Kroger and they were great! BUT, these were hard and dry. They are not expired, so I don’t know what the problem is. Maybe they were frozen? I don’t know, but, definitely very poor quality compared to what I’ve bought at the store. Will not order again.
customer_reviews.author: Jamie W

customer_reviews.title: Unique texture - funny taste
customer_reviews.text: I loved the idea of only 4 ingredients and no additives. I like dates and thought these would be good. It tasted like burnt coffee :(. I decided to share them with a bunch of our customers. The reviews were mixed. Most said they were ' different" but that even though they were not the worse thing they ever ate, they were not the best either and they did not want a second one. Perhaps an aquired taste and aquired texture.
customer_reviews.author: It'sJustImjaymi-Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Old looking box
customer_reviews.text: I received my box today. Unfortunately I am a little paranoid and didn't like the way the package looked. Opened on every side. Had a piece of tape to put it back together. Very old, beaten box. Will not rebuy.
customer_reviews.author: Maaron

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars....until now
customer_reviews.text: Original 5 star review comments: Soooo tasty. Who needs peanut butter cups now??? Not me! Update 10/18/17: Inedible with my latest subscription delivery. The packaging is now just plastic, previously it appeared to be a reflective mylar. I'm guessing that this packaging change has made these dry out quickly, or the production facility is having a problem. Whatever the issue, I'm not going to buy these, or any other Larabars for awhile.
customer_reviews.author: Joy

customer_reviews.title: They Are Nowhere Near As Good As They USED to Be!
customer_reviews.text: I used to love these. When I buy them from my local grocery store, they are moist. However, when I get them from Amazon.com, they have been so darn dry with poor flavor, despite having good expiration dates. Just awful.
customer_reviews.author: CJ

customer_reviews.title: 9 Months Expired.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars usually but this order was expired by almost a year! I took one bite and about spit it out then checked the expiration! The expiration is on the outside of the box so there is no way to overlook it. Definitely makes me apprehensive about trusting any other amazon fulfilled orders of food... :(
customer_reviews.author: A. Butler

customer_reviews.title: Dried out and stale
customer_reviews.text: This is exactly why I don't like to buy food online. There's no way of knowing how long it sat in a hot warehouse or truck. Larabars used to be my favorite. I bought peanutbutter ones for grandkids but these went straight in the garbage. They're stale, and like rocks. I'll never waste money on these again.
customer_reviews.author: feralcat

customer_reviews.title: kind of disappointed with the taste
customer_reviews.text: Bought it due to a massive price discount, kind of disappointed with the taste. I have been buying CLIF BAR - Energy Bar for the longest time so decided to give this brand a chance. It is just not for me, maybe to some other folks I just can't get over with the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Roofless Villian

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a candy bar!!!
customer_reviews.text: I suffer from irritable bowel syndrome and was in chronic pain for almost a full year. I had to change my diet and get rid of processed foods. I tried many protein bars, most of which tasted like cardboard but then I tried these!! Honestly, this particular flavor tastes like a candy bar! I would never, ever, ever guess that these were made from all natural ingredients! I eat 1 every single day for breakfast - I feel like I’m having a candy bar treat every morning yet I never feel hungry after and feel full of energy!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Kim BookJunkie, freelance editor & proofreader

customer_reviews.title: Tasty Supplemental Food; All 'Real Food'
customer_reviews.text: Larabar PEANUT AND CHOCOLATE CHIP bars include DATES, providing 210 Calories per 1.6 oz. bar, 12 grams of 'good' fat, 23 grams of Carbohydrates and 65 milligrams of Sodium. Most of the sweetness in the bar comes from the sugar in the dates. The result is an agreeably flavored, nutrition dense take-along supplemental food for physical activities such as day hikes, trail runs, etc., or for reasonable snacking between meals for an energy boost. Unlike flakey grain-based energy bars, Larabar is easier on the mouth. Use it as a 'go-to' energy bar or mix it into the rotation with other grain-based bars.
customer_reviews.author: James EllsworthTop Contributor: Cooking

customer_reviews.title: So rotten it turned me off larabars completely.
customer_reviews.text: So very gross. Like they had been sitting in a hot warehouse, melted, molded together in the night, and then dropped on my doorstep. Completely nasty, flavor off, texture bad. The color was whiteish like they turned a long time ago and then sold to me. Thanks, jerks.
customer_reviews.author: VM

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh
customer_reviews.text: This was my first time buying larabar off amazon. I ordered cookie dough and they were great. However, I ordered Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip and they are horrible. I have had this flavor many times before and decided to buy a big pack because I enjoy this flavor. They are hard as a rock!! The expiration date is 21 Dec 2018. They taste different from when I had this flavor before. I will not buy these again from amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Dominique Savidge

customer_reviews.title: Great for school!
customer_reviews.text: I have multiple people attending college in my household and it is hard to keep up with keeping everyone in food while they're gone. These are quick, easy, affordable, and hold us over between classes. I love being able to keep something in my bag that doesn't require refrigeration and is small since I already have enough to carry! These taste great and have ingredients I can feel good about feeding my family.
customer_reviews.author: Sandy N.

customer_reviews.title: sitting around in some warehouse too long!
customer_reviews.text: I have been meaning write a review on these. i love lara bars but these arrived stale and hard like rocks with the chocolate and outer parts of the bar a little grey looking. They were dry as boards and i know this is not what lara had intended for their product. i am going learn how to make my own 'lara' bars at home.
customer_reviews.author: Trina

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with these
customer_reviews.text: I am so disappointed! These are my favorite snack bars so I decided to save money by buying a 16 count box instead of buying them individually as they are sold at my local grocery store. The box that I ordered is hard, dry, and has a bad taste. They are in date so I’m not sure why they have spoiled, but I will be throwing all of them in the trash.
customer_reviews.author: Coy

customer_reviews.title: Just horrible.
customer_reviews.text: I've ordered these bars once, maybe twice in the past & have really enjoyed them. They were just like in stores: fresh, soft, chewy & delicious. This time however, the bars are hard, dry, stale & tasteless. The expiration date on the box says April 2019 so I think they have been stored improperly. I an disappointed that the quality control is so poor.
customer_reviews.author: Lyndee Littlefield

customer_reviews.title: First time try-er
customer_reviews.text: My family and I have never once tried a Larabar of any kind. We’re picky southern eaters and we don’t buy “fancy” foods. I bought these with my fingers crossed and glad I did. There sort of like brownies with peanuts but without the heart burn afterward. Learning 3/6 of my household are sensitive to gluten and dairy. These are wonderful for adults & kids. I was nervous because of the photo reviews but mine came perfectly packaged, expiration date 10 months away. They even came earlier than expected. 100% would recommend to other first time Larabarers.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Perez

customer_reviews.title: pleasant suprise
customer_reviews.text: I typically don't go for anything vegetarian or vegan, to be frank because in my opinion there isn't much in that category in my experience that has much flavor compared to other foods. Figured i'd give this a whirl for a "healthy" alternative compared to a pop tart or something comparable. Really tasty, my only qualm is I for some reason feel a tiny bit of acid reflux with these. BUT i feel better overall than I did previously with other snacks
customer_reviews.author: Drew

customer_reviews.title: Beware of super hard pieces of nut
customer_reviews.text: Beware! The last three times I’ve ordered this product there have been super hard pieces of nut or shell in bar that are unchewable. I almost have chipped my tooth a few times. It is painful when you bite down on these hard pieces. Sometimes they get stuck in between teeth and hard to get out. This didn’t used to be a problem. They must have changed something in the process and what they are putting in the recipe. I’ll never order these again!
customer_reviews.author: Paul W

customer_reviews.title: These were great...not all have been..
customer_reviews.text: These were great. Good tasting and came fresh and perfect. It seems dumb to say that, but some larabars I've ordered have not come fresh or even clean packaged (two boxes in my experience so far) Amazon does not allow their return. Not a cheap experience.
customer_reviews.author: MJO

customer_reviews.title: Few ingredients, delicious.  But not diet!
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars. Some of the other Larabars have even fewer ingredients; for example I think the Cashew bars are just dates and cashews. These have 4, counting chocolate chips as a single ingredient which they really aren't of course. Regardless, I feel like I am eating a healthy, minimally processed food with no sacrifice of taste But they aren't part of a weight loss diet, at over 200 calories per bar.
customer_reviews.author: Daryl

customer_reviews.title: Not worth a penny.
customer_reviews.text: Lousy tasting and overly dry to the taste. Lara bars seem to be popular as I see them in many health food and specialty stores but why? Nothing special in nutritional value and taste like an old bar that lost its flavor. Waste of money.
customer_reviews.author: C. Low

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: We only received 14 bars not the standard 16 in our order!!
customer_reviews.author: David Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Good snack bar
customer_reviews.text: I cannot have soy and soy is in almost everything so these are one of the few bars that I can even eat. Thankfully I love peanut butter and these actually taste pretty good and are usually a better price than most of the others.
customer_reviews.author: W. Schneider

customer_reviews.title: Long black hair in the bars.
customer_reviews.text: I love these bars and thought it was a great deal, so of course I bought them. Then in 2 bars from this batch, I bit into some long nasty hairs....I’m almost afraid to eat the rest of the bars in the box bc quite frankly it’s digusting to see a hair embedded into the bar.....and I tried to break apart the bar, but it looked like it was as long as the bar, yuck
customer_reviews.author: Melissa Jubane

customer_reviews.title: Complete with Foreign Objects to Break Your Teeth!
customer_reviews.text: 6 bars from the same package are riddled with rocks and/or thick shells! I can live with the odd missed shell but this is crazy! We used to love these but just can’t trust them anymore. I’m lucky to not have any broken teeth as a result...
customer_reviews.author: Kyron Walsh

customer_reviews.title: STALE!
customer_reviews.text: I loved these bars so much! They taste good, they're vegan, they have very few ingredients and kept me going on my busy days as a college student - I rely a lot on protein bars like this. I made a subscription and was very happy with it for months. However, the last THREE boxes I received were full of TOTALLY STALE, disgusting bars! After this third box I realized it wasn't a coincidence and my subscription is canceled. I guess I'll have to buy them from the regular ol' grocery store now. Thanks a lot, Jeff Bezos!
customer_reviews.author: capitalism

customer_reviews.title: They've been great! I love the flavor
customer_reviews.text: I've had these in my subscription order for a few months now. They've been great! I love the flavor. But this last order they came very hard and have a chemical taste. My kids grabbed a few and commented on how hard and gross they were as well. At this moment I'm not sure I want to order them again. I'm not sure if its just a bad batch or what.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole M

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: nom nom nom. . . so good UPDATE 12/14/2017 For three consecutive months now, the quality of the Larabars has plummeted. The bars are dried out and crumbly and the packaging always appears as if someone has rifled through the box. This last month's delivery was the final straw. I received my package with a "better by" date that was four months old. Not sure if that means there still "safe" to eat, but the first one I opened appeared to be far beyond expiration and did not look appetizing in the littlest. So disappointing!
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: Nope
customer_reviews.text: I love Larabars, and these are my favorite flavors, but don't order this. I have no idea what the problem is but these taste terrible. They're hard and chalky and disgusting, and I regret buying this.
customer_reviews.author: Shayna M. Weddle

customer_reviews.title: Husband approved.
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves these snack bars. This flavor and the peanut butter cookie are his favorites. I think he prefers this one more because of the chocolate in it. I like that this product is available for subscribe and save, so we are able to get it for much less than we are able to buy these snack bars at stores in our area.
customer_reviews.author: MrsO

customer_reviews.title: Really good and really fresh!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because I needed something to keep in my purse for when hunger strikes me like a Light Saber. So many other protein bars are just too nutty, full of whey (which I'm sensitive to) , or just plain yucky. This one is soft, and very tasty! I will be ordering more soon as I am putting it in my lunch bag every day as well as in my purse haha .
customer_reviews.author: Dianne93101

customer_reviews.title: I hate dry, crunchy energy bars that have like 1
customer_reviews.text: Okay, full disclosure... I'm probably addicted to these things. I hate dry, crunchy energy bars that have like 1,000 ingredients, so I love Lärabars! They are chewy, and have like five ingredients. Dates are the primary ingredient in most of them, but they don't taste like dates at all. (I don't hate dates, but I know some people do, so this might make a difference for them.) Also, I'm allergic to almonds, which are a popular energy bar ingredient. Some Lärabar flavors have almonds, but this flavor and a few other are almond free. Been subscribed to these things for a few years now and plan to continue receiving a big box every six months!
customer_reviews.author: Carmen R. St Jean

customer_reviews.title: Healthy and Quick Snack on the Go!
customer_reviews.text: I love Larabars. They are great for quick on the go low blood sugar boosters. I usually buy the fruity varieties but my husband loves peanut butter so we tried the Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip this time. The bar seems a little smaller than the Apple or Cherry variety. It is very sweet, almost a little too sweet for my taste. Alas, my husband still didn't like them. Something about the aftertaste of the dates I think. But overall if you are looking for a sweet on the go treat, and like peanut butter and chocolate, you cannot go wrong with this bar. Plus it has fruit in it!
customer_reviews.author: A. Ingram

customer_reviews.title: Tastes like a chocolate peanutbutter
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite Lars bars. I diet and work out, so when I’m trying to stay on track, these little bars are my saving grace when I need something to curb a craving without undoing all my hard work. I try to buy in bulk so it’s less expensive. I wish they had coupons or betters deals because I would buy them more often if they were cheaper.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa

customer_reviews.title: great taste, quality issues (be careful of hard pieces inside that can damage teeth)
customer_reviews.text: I really like the taste, but several times has bitten into some very hard pieces, like pieces of sand or glass. Luckily, my tooth seem intact. I discarded the rest of the package since I am afraid to damage my teetch. It is unlikely that I will buy buy this again in the near term despite I like the taste.
customer_reviews.author: Alex K

customer_reviews.title: Good price decent snack
customer_reviews.text: They taste ok, and have a good consistansy. They are not too filling I mean is a decent snack but it won't fill you up. Maybe 2 or three of them but that defeat the purpose right? The price is great, I think all these bars should be around this price and not higher. I will buy them again
customer_reviews.author: Fco_cali

customer_reviews.title: I've lost interest in Larabars
customer_reviews.text: I used to eat these often because they were convenient to have tucked in my purse. But I've gotten tired of their pastyness--from the dates. Caution: you might want to eat these before their expiration date because they do have a tendency to get moldy.
customer_reviews.author: sapphire blue

customer_reviews.title: My box was taped shut with scotch which was weird ...
customer_reviews.text: My box was taped shut with scotch which was weird. No evidence of tamper with the bars themselves however they were so dry, I buy these often from the grocery store and they are usually moist and chewy. These where dry and crumbly, I checked expiration date and the bars were nowhere close to the date, so idk. Not buying again tho
customer_reviews.author: allie

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Such a good value for this bar. We love these as a quick snack, meal supplement, or even a healthier treat. My toddlers love these, as do my husband and I. They are always mixed and chopped up good enough for me to not worry about choking, and I know the kids are getting some decent nutrients from the bars. Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Laurel

customer_reviews.title: The first time ever
customer_reviews.text: This is the1st time I ever recieved a stale product from larabar. I order a box probably monthly.Money wasted
customer_reviews.author: iRock

customer_reviews.title: IMO, best Larabar flavor. Great on the go snack.
customer_reviews.text: This is my favorite larabar flavor. The chocolate chips really help improve the usual power bar texture. Great for on the go or when I have to rush to a meeting and don’t have time for lunch. They’re a regular on my subscribe and save subscription list.
customer_reviews.author: GinnyRae

customer_reviews.title: These are no longer fresh
customer_reviews.text: I have been using this product for years. The last few shipments of this product have been either old or something wrong with them. They were dry and tasteless compared to normal. I took them off of my subscribe and save because of this. There was no other place to complain about them so I put it here.
customer_reviews.author: Marty Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Amazon should be ashamed
customer_reviews.text: Most recent order arrived with an expiration date of next month. This is truly pathetic on Amazon’s part. The bars were hard and extremely unpleasant to eat. I tested two bars and decided to throw out the entire box down the trash. A waste of money. I love Larabars but lesson learned: never buy them from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Mo

customer_reviews.title: Too rich.
customer_reviews.text: I offered these bars two for adults and two children and the reaction was unanimous. No one including myself cared for them they were just too rich. The don’t come across as a chocolate bar I guess it’s theDates and I love dates. I guess it’s the combination I definitely will not re-order this product.
customer_reviews.author: ba p mitchell

customer_reviews.title: One of the tastier health bars!
customer_reviews.text: A friend of mine got this flavor at their Costco. They don't sell it at my Costco though. So I got it on Amazon. A bit pricier than my other bars, but the flavor of this one is extremely good! Very few all natural ingredients. Simple and delicious. Recommend!
customer_reviews.author: mm

customer_reviews.title: Open Box
customer_reviews.text: I love the bars which is why I gave it 5 stars, BUT when I opened the box and looked at the Larabar Box it was practically open. Only one side was 5% glued. The other 3 sides were completely unglued and the bars were falling out. Not happy with the packaging.
customer_reviews.author: Ariel Skiee

customer_reviews.title: Ant infestation in the box
customer_reviews.text: The box was full of ants! gross I threw it out.
customer_reviews.author: Tabitha

customer_reviews.title: Simple and nutritious bars - will buy again.
customer_reviews.text: These bars were surprisingly delicious. If you read the ingredients, there really isn't much to them. So you know they aren't processed and full of useless things your body doesn't need. I will say this...I've tried a few different flavors, and none of them taste "quite like" what the advertised flavor is....but they are still delicious. I will buy again........if they come back on sale that is. :)
customer_reviews.author: Josh Smith

customer_reviews.title: Stale
customer_reviews.text: I have eaten a lot of Larabars and these were stale, not sure how long these were sitting around the warehouse.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Marron

customer_reviews.title: Yummy Gluten Free Bars
customer_reviews.text: Nothing showed up when I clicked under flavor--hope the click was for highest marks as these bars were very good. Excellent value for the money too. Glad I found these and will buy again.
customer_reviews.author: lorrhans

customer_reviews.title: Great snack for kids too!
customer_reviews.text: My 3yo LOVES these Larabars. They’re his favorite snack. They are a much better alternative to junk food because they have only four simple and natural ingredients. Any price under $1 per Larabar is a good deal and Amazon always has them.
customer_reviews.author: Melanie D

customer_reviews.title: tasty
customer_reviews.text: I bought these bars after finding out that other bars I had chosen were flagged by California for containing lead. I cannot be sure about this (how can lead find its way to chocolate bar!) but I opted for these Larabars instead that looked less suspicious. They are very tasty, rich in chocolate and peanut butter and enough to ease an evening appetite. They taste like theyre made out of something good. The multi-bar box packaging is very convenient and saves your money
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Bars went bad
customer_reviews.text: We've been ordering these consistently and this order had a strange smell to the bars. A family member got sick after eating it so we had to throw out the batch. It's frustrating because they are not cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Phil Ranker

customer_reviews.title: almost..  but not quite great, just "good"
customer_reviews.text: I am split on Larabar in general. Sometimes I feel like they're pretty wholesome.. other times, I feel like I'm sacrificing a lot of flavor but still getting unwanted sugar, you know? If I'm gonna eat some tree bark, I want less sugar content. However, I think these are great replacements for most of the crappy energy / nutrition bars on the market.
customer_reviews.author: A. Bruce

customer_reviews.title: Shared a meal with a stranger
customer_reviews.text: My larabar box was opened and taped closed and had a bar missing. Which in the grand scheme of things isn't a big deal, but seriously?
customer_reviews.author: Lynnie

customer_reviews.title: Great taste
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite flavor! They are a tasty treat any part of the day I need a snack. I love that there are no large chunks of peanuts. The kids love them too and they are convenient to take on the go. I paid about $1 a bar which is a good deal in my opinion.
customer_reviews.author: LIZ

customer_reviews.title: 2nd order had much better expiration dates
customer_reviews.text: Love these Choc. Chip Pb bars! Not too sweet and just enough chocolate and peanut butter taste. Perfect for snack. Tried Amazon delivery a second time and received bars with better expiration dates. Sent back the first order with a less than a month expiration date.
customer_reviews.author: ZCCH - Sonoma, CA

customer_reviews.title: Not fresh, bars were dry and partially broken
customer_reviews.text: I have been buying these bars and various stores and never had an issue with them. I ordered a whole box and to my surprise, 4 bars out of the box so far have been dry and not very tasty. Few of the bars have been partially broken . The box was also damaged , perhaps too many boxes were sitting on top of each other. The expiration date is still fine but I have the feeling these bars are being stored in inadequate conditions which causes the bars to break down and dry out. I ll be requesting a refund
customer_reviews.author: Beata

customer_reviews.title: Did the recipe recently change?
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered the Peanut Butter Chocolate flavor for about a year as part of a monthly delivery for mid-afternoon snacks at work and loved them, but suddenly my last couple of boxes have had dried out bars that are much more crumbly. They used to be much more moist, but haven't had any luck recently. The flavor has been a little off as well. I am going to have to look for a new snack bar...
customer_reviews.author: Joseph Ambrosio

customer_reviews.title: Delectable, clean ingredients
customer_reviews.text: Yummy. These came fresh. Only giving 4 stars as had 2 boxes in the past (not from amazon that were moldy upon opening the same day after purchasing from Target & not expired). Will start buying from Lara Bar again after better quality control noted, as the ingredients are clean and the bar is delectable.
customer_reviews.author: cricket

customer_reviews.title: Good meal replacement when on the run
customer_reviews.text: These bars are easy to throw in a gym bag, lunch box, or purse - and nibble upon when dinner is going to be a couple hours late, when riding in the car, or when you need an energy boost to last out a shopping trip. These are a composite of “stuff” so a hot car won’t turn any chocolate to liquid and a gooey mess. Good taste (far removed from cardboard tasting energy bars).
customer_reviews.author: AZN CUST NC

customer_reviews.title: Dry
customer_reviews.text: Why are people buying this?! These are horribly dry and gross.
customer_reviews.author: co

customer_reviews.title: Look forward to my bar every day
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely delicious. I always look forward to my Bar each day. The bar is soft, very flavorful and takes care of my hunger in between meals. I also love that it is Vegan. You should give it a try, you won’t be disappointed:)
customer_reviews.author: Gayla1

customer_reviews.title: Larabars were dried out -- Ugh!
customer_reviews.text: I'm not sure what was wrong with this box of Larabars, I've ordered them before. But this box, I tried a couple, and they are very dried out (as if they are really old, although the date on them is fine.) Amzon, I'm not sure what I should do - can I send the rest of the box back for a replacement?
customer_reviews.author: SLM

customer_reviews.title: Something is wrong with these...
customer_reviews.text: We are longtime Larabar eaters. This is my first time purchasing from Amazon. There's definitely something wrong with these... They don't taste right. Very strong alcohol-like smell and flavor. They weren't past their expiration, but we're definitely not eating them. Returned.
customer_reviews.author: pat d

customer_reviews.title: Two to three month expiration date
customer_reviews.text: I order Larabars in a 10 pack on a regular basis. In the month of July, I ordered 3 boxes of 16/box to take on a trip When they tasted drier than usual, we looked at the expiration date. One of the boxes listed September 2019 and two of the boxes listed October 2019.
customer_reviews.author: LA Lady

customer_reviews.title: Your shipping box was fine but the Larabar box inside was opened and 5 ...
customer_reviews.text: Your shipping box was fine but the Larabar box inside was opened and 5 bars missing. Obviously your employees enjoyed 5 of the bars.
customer_reviews.author: gypsypup

customer_reviews.title: My Kids Favorite Kind Of Lara Bars!
customer_reviews.text: Still my kids favorite kind of Lara bars! I order them regularly because Amazon has them for a great price, and they always arrive quickly. They are kind of a staple in our house with 9 kids.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi B

customer_reviews.title: Delicious, excellent ingredients
customer_reviews.text: These bars are delicious. Peanut butter is my favorite , although all flavors are good. They’re just large enough to help immediate hunger for my kids between meals, and I love the healthy ingredients and no added sugars. I’m a repeat buyer.
customer_reviews.author: Lizzie

customer_reviews.title: Found something that should not be in this bar!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I was eating my Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip bar and “low & behold” I cracked my tooth on something so hard that I thought a piece of my own tooth broke off. After retrieving this piece I realized it is in no way a nut, peanut, or cashew. It is ROCK hard and looks like a piece of bone or hard plastic. Awful, not sure if I dare reorder!! Be careful people.
customer_reviews.author: ladybug

customer_reviews.title: Great for running to alternate with gels
customer_reviews.text: Larabar makes several flavors, but this one is my favorite. I use one on my longest runs along with energy gels and these get me through half marathon distances and more if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Too Tall

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Product was poorly packaged, so packed was squashed and open. Some of the bars were squashed and broken.
customer_reviews.author: Colleen

customer_reviews.title: My absolute favorite snack bar
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite snack bar! I am not a person who likes to try new things, especially weird fruits that are put into snack bars, but I honestly don't even taste the dates. They are a great texture and the bar is sweet without being over-sweet. I keep getting these over and over again because they taste better than another other snack bars I can find. Bonus: they are healthy too!
customer_reviews.author: Lauren

customer_reviews.title: Usually good, not this time
customer_reviews.text: I am a huge Larabar fan and they are usually excellent. However, I purchased the Peanut Butter Chocolate version from Alexa's deals and they are incredibly dried out and hard with no flavor at all! I was able to return them for a refund. Larabar's quality is usually much better, however I do occasionally receive a box that is bone dry.
customer_reviews.author: Emily Esposito

customer_reviews.title: DELICIOUS
customer_reviews.text: My absolute favorite of the LaraBar line. They taste like an actual peanut butter and chocolate bar without any weird aftertaste or added goo into their product. I bought them originally to pack into our hospital bag for when the baby comes, but I’ve honestly already eaten quite a few and will probably need to buy another box.
customer_reviews.author: Williams

customer_reviews.title: Not so good.
customer_reviews.text: Flavor seemed off (peanut butter and chocolate chip). I am used to RX bars which to me taste much better though they are more expensive. I won’t be ordering these again.
customer_reviews.author: Mindy

customer_reviews.title: Short expiration date this time
customer_reviews.text: We buy these LaraBar snacks often. Love the product for no refrig, on the go. This time I called Amazon bc the exp date is March 24 2019. I rec these 02/10/19 and was told unless I do a return they will not change their methods. Typically the product arrives with a three month window to consume the 16 bars. Buy elsewhere if the best buy date matters to you.
customer_reviews.author: Awellroundedgamer

customer_reviews.title: Not healthy despite its claims
customer_reviews.text: While I appreciate the nod to vegan, this product is loaded with unhealthy additives—sugar, saturated fat, and salt. Beware, it’s not a healthy alternative.
customer_reviews.author: prop0017

customer_reviews.title: Would love them, if they ever got here.
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these bars, but every single time I order them they are late. Sometimes a couple months late. I would order them regularly, but it’s just not worth the aggravation.
customer_reviews.author: Marianne

customer_reviews.title: Kids love em!
customer_reviews.text: My daughter's don't like anything that's remotely healthy as far as snack things are concerned. But for some reason the youngest attached to these "bars" and she wants them all the time. Much healthier than most.
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: Tasty bars
customer_reviews.text: I really like the flavor of these bars. They are not too heavy on the chocolate or the peanut butter so I think the two flavors are blended very well.
customer_reviews.author: Ozzie M.

customer_reviews.title: I like 'em
customer_reviews.text: Being diagnosed with Celiac Disease a few months ago, I was trying to find snacks that are portable so I don't starve between breakfast and lunch while at work. The peanut butter Larabars are definitely my favorite, the taste is good and oddly, the texture is probably my favorite part of the bars. They're just fun to eat and brings back memories of the Before Times when I could pretty much eat anything I wanted without having to worry about my intestines rotting and my skin turning into what I can only describe as 'lizard-like'.
customer_reviews.author: flabslapper

customer_reviews.title: Such a yummy treat!
customer_reviews.text: We order these thru S&S and they are the best price. Such a yummy treat. If you don’t eat candy on a regular basis these become like a candy bar :) I love them!
customer_reviews.author: Angela V.

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: I love Larabars and while I like the idea of making them myself with homemade recipes, it's just so much easier to buy them in the package ( and it's a lot less work and less clean up too!). This was an excellent purchase and I was worried about them being melted or as much as they could be because of the summer heat. They arrived just fine! I also want to say that I had 2 day shipping so if I ordered this again I would again get 2 day shipping instead of it being a week or more in shipping.
customer_reviews.author: Heather S.

customer_reviews.title: Best Pre Packaged Breakfast Bars
customer_reviews.text: PB Chocolate Chip Lara bars are the best pre-packaged every bars on the market. They taste good, but aren't full of excessive junk and sugar. They are a pantry staple at our house.
customer_reviews.author: Estee Davis

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Gluten free Snack
customer_reviews.text: I need some food to keep my blood sugar up when I am traveling. The Larabar is the perfect solution for someone who needs to eat Gluten free! I love this flavor ( peanut butter chocolate)!
customer_reviews.author: Customer two

customer_reviews.title: Very richly flavored
customer_reviews.text: These bars had everything I was looking for- gluten free, protein, etc. and peanut butter. I usually like peanut butter flavored bars but I found this one to be too rich. It doesn't taste like peanut butter to me, but more like dark chocolate. I can only eat half a bar and then it gets to be too much, like eating a rich piece of chocolate cake. I probably should've bought a single bar before I purchased a whole box.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Great Flavor
customer_reviews.text: Love the fact that they only have five ingredients and flavorful. Having a harder time finding them at truck stops. The price seems to continue to go up so I have to find alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: llmor

customer_reviews.title: Dry and taste horrible
customer_reviews.text: I have loved every flavor of Larabar that I have tried until I bought a box of the Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip. They are not expired, at least according to the date on the box, but they are very dry and taste absolutely horrible. The texture is so different from any other Larabar that I've ever tried that I suspect that something is wrong with the recipe for these.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Delicious and nutritious
customer_reviews.text: I'm a big fan of Larabars. Simple ingredients that provide adequate energy and taste good. The only problem is my kids feel the same way and half the time eat them before I have a chance.
customer_reviews.author: JSK

customer_reviews.title: Best healthy snack bar!
customer_reviews.text: I love larabars! Minimal and natural ingredients makes it a best source of nutrition and tasty snacks for everyone in our household.
customer_reviews.author: AmazonBuyer

customer_reviews.title: Must buy! So good!
customer_reviews.text: Delicious and so affordable compared to buy it at the store. Love that it’s healthy, vegan and just so delicious! Pop in the oven for 30 seconds and you have a brownie.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Foreign object in bar broke off a piece of my tooth
customer_reviews.text: I broke off a piece of my tooth when I bit into this unknown object in the bar! Will never eat one again
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: we have these on monthly order
customer_reviews.text: we get these every month. the are great for on the go when you don't have time to sit to eat. I only wish they were packaged a bit better the box is usually smashed or torn apart when it gets here
customer_reviews.author: april y

customer_reviews.title: Best Larabar Flavor EVER!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a fan of the classic combo of chocolate and peanut butter, then this is the Larabar for you! I see these as a "special treat" since it's easy to get caught up in the "hey, it's nuts and fruit, it won't hurt me" mentality. Look at the sugar content...can we say candy bar? But, if I'm going to eat sugar, let's make is super yummy with super clean ingredients! Looking for a non-chocolate or non-peanut alternative? I also am a fan of pecan pie and the blueberry muffin flavor! Really, I don't know if I've ever had a Larabar flavor that disappoints!
customer_reviews.author: PerpetualPonderings

customer_reviews.title: My favorite energy bar!!
customer_reviews.text: I love this energy bar. It has great taste and just a few ingredients that are good for you. I buy this a lot, both through Amazon and from a store. Would definitely recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: Larabar, Gluten Free Bar, Peanut Butter Chocolate Chip, Vegan (16 Bars)
product_meta.description: Size:16 Count (Pack of 1)Everyoneâ€™s favorite flavor combination - peanut butter and chocolate come together for ""WOW!"" inducing deliciousness. But this bar is also nutritious. This bar has 15% DV Fiber and the peanuts are a good source of protein. Add simple, 4-ingredient Fair Trade Certified chocolate chips and you have one outstanding gluten-free treat.
feature_bullets: WHOLESOME FOOD: Tasty snack bars made with Fair Trade Certified chocolate chips
REAL FLAVORS: 4-ingredient bars made from a simple blend of dates, peanuts, chocolate chips, and sea salt
CONVENIENCE: Wholesome snacks for a busy, on-the go breakfast and perfect for your active lifestyle

specifications.Domestic Shipping: Currently, item can be shipped only within the U.S. and to APO/FPO addresses. For APO/FPO shipments, please check with the manufacturer regarding warranty and support issues.
specifications.International Shipping: This item is not eligible for international shipping.
